title: Instalockers
body: Someone needs to do something about people that do not call their lanes in Blind Pick. I'm getting annoyed by the ammount of minutes I have to wait in a waiting line because I dodged a game to avoid having 3 tops or no adc etc.{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
"Team Builder" took too long to queue because of how much power you had when choosing the roles and the host could pick and choose who joined and who didn't.

I think have the "Dynamic Queue" lobby but adapted to blind pick (no bans, can't see enemies, ect.)
